title: Have jayce and gnar been on sale yet for september sales?
body:
Have jayce and gnar been on sale yet for september sales?

thank you

replies.body: It doesn't look like they've been on sale this month.  I suggest bookmarking our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date on current champion or skin sales.  Hopefully our beloved angry yordle will make an appearance soon!
